restaurant.name: Pre-Taste
restaurant.tagline: Test the Taste at Pre-Tasteâ€”The Only PreTest You'll Enjoy

items.name: Kinilaw
items.description: A delicacy from Mindanao region, essentially ceviche with tropical flavors of mango. Made with a unique and traditional recipe.

items.name: Lumpiang Ubod/Sariwa
items.description: A wholesome fresh spring roll from Negros Occidental, cheesy with a crispy wrapper alongside our Honey Garlic Peanut Sauce.

items.name: Cheesy Longganisa
items.description: A tasty flavor of longganisa with a twist from the cheese. Making it more appetizing, flavorful, and savory.

items.name: Bicol-Style Longganisa
items.description: Flavorful sausage inspired by Bicol Express, with savory and spicy meat, paired with cheese or veggies, shaped into lollipop balls.

items.name: Kinunot
items.description: A Bicolano dish rich in creaminess, served with thick and comforting tender seasoned meat.

items.name: Sinuglaw Skewer
items.description: A touch of savory flavor of pork belly and marinated fish, freshly served at an affordable price.

items.name: Cheesy Laing Bruschetta
items.description: A fusion of Filipino and Italian flavors. Richness in creaminess, a touch of spicy laing, and crispy bruschetta.

items.name: Cheesy Alimango Canape
items.description: Bite-sized canape with creamy alimango shredded on top, its creaminess melts in your mouth.

items.name: Ginabot Fritters
items.description: Cebuano street food of deep-fried pork intestines, finely chopped and mixed with shredded taro root, served with sweet and spicy dipping sauce.

items.name: Humba Spring Roll Dippers
items.description: Slow-cooked Cebuano pork shredded and wrapped into small spring rolls, then deep-fried until crispy.

items.name: Pancit Molo
items.description: A healthier version featuring vegetable-filled dumplings simmered in hot broth for comfort and refreshment.

items.name: Mini Pizza Chicken Inasal
items.description: A smoky, tangy, cheesy appetizer. Iconic chicken inasal from Bacolod served as a pizza with the same smoky and savory flavor.

items.name: Sinapot
items.description: A comforting Bicolano snack of mashed saba bananas shaped into bite-sized balls, coated with flavored glaze, served on a stick.

items.name: Ginataang Bilo-bilo
items.description: From Aklan, chewy glutinous rice balls simmered in coconut milk and sugar, served halo-halo style.

items.name: Cassava
items.description: A spin on the traditional Bohol delicacy, sweet with a gooey center. A blend of cassava and mashed ube topped with sweetened milk glaze.

items.name: Buchi and Camote Cheese Balls
items.description: Glutinous rice dough mixed with mashed sweet potato, filled with local goat cheese and chorizo de Cebu, served with honey-mustard sauce.

items.name: Moron
items.description: A comforting Eastern Samar delicacy of sticky rice cooked in coconut milk and cocoa, in a small, flavor-packed portion.

items.name: Tambis-Tambis
items.description: A simple, sweet coconut treat from Eastern Samar sprinkled with white sugar, transformed into a coconut snowball.

items.name: Binagol
items.description: Steamed dessert from Leyte made from grated taro, coconut milk, and condensed milk, with savory fillings like salted egg or chicharon.

items.name: Kamote Cue
items.description: Popular Filipino street food, crispy sweet potato balls with cheese filling, double-coated in chocolate for a decadent flavor.

items.name: Cassava Chips
items.description: Crunchy cassava chips cut like French fries, dusted with bold cheese powder and drizzled with rich, melted chocolate.
